IÂ´ve heard so much raving about the tiny changes that George Lucas did to the BD films.  HeÂ´s just tinkering with his own creation & that is his right.  When SW 4 was released, he had given all film profit to Fox to keep all rights on the show paraphernalias, like software games, board games action characters, etc.  Now he has come back to control much more.  Not bad at all. 2 out of 367 seed connected after 1.5hrs.  Sharing is not a strong point.  If everyone would set their uploading limit to 0.8% the trading would be alot  faster to download.

I don't know if it's an additional feature you have to enable like a directors commentary, or if they're only viewable as bonus material separate from the films.  Either way I hope we get an upload of the bonus material soon.
